downloadDescription: ​This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the Communicator module in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.
detailsSection:
AudienceThis training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the Communicator module in Microsoft Dynamics SL. At Training Material CompletionAfter reviewing this training, individuals will understand:
  • Viewing and sending messages
  • Communicator messages and alerts
  • Setting up the Communicator module
PrerequisitesBefore reviewing this training, it is recommended that individuals have:
  • Foundational knowledge and skill using the Dynamics SL 2015 Project modules.
  • Basic knowledge of accounting principles.
